quoteText: You may be held liable for losses incurred by Apple or any other user of or visitor to the Site due to someone else using your Apple ID, password or account as a result of your failing to keep your account information secure and confidential.
title: You're liable if someone else uses your Apple ID

tosdr.case: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.
tosdr.tldr: You're liable if someone else uses your Apple ID
